refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the size of the current viewing cube to the specified view_size (in local units).

refsection.para: Sets the size of the current viewing cube to the specified view_size (in local units). This size is the length of any side of the square MGED display.
The example shows the use of the size command to set the MGED display to a specified number of units across.

info.title: Set the size of the MGED display.

example.para: Sets the MGED display to be 250 units across.
